title: Message to President Wilhelm Miklas of Austria About the Death of Ambassador Albert Henry Washburn.
text:
I HAVE received Your Excellency's sympathetic telegram with reference to the death of Mr. Albert Henry Washburn. I consider that this Government has lost one of its most able diplomats and I am deeply appreciative of Your Excellency's expression of the sentiments of Austria toward him.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency Wilhelm Miklas, Federal President of Austria, Vienna]
